Text: Volunteer to help flood victimsIs Enron going to be doing anything en masse to help flood victims I realize that Enron has already donated a substantial amount of money but I wondered if employees would be given time off during the work day to help those less fortunate I volunteered Sunday afternoon at LBJ Hospital Gail Kettenbrink CCNA CCDA MCSE Network Engineer Enron NetWorks LLC Smith Street Houston Texas desk cell pager email mailto mailto
